name: Approxen
description: Approxen comprises of highly experienced mobile strategists, designers, programmers and developers who share a passion to create engaging web and mobile user-experiences. They have acquired specialized education in their respective fields to create exceptional technologies and digital marketing solutions. The company has been designing and developing mobile for over five years now combining talents to produce compelling mobile applications that achieve fantastic results.

locations.address: Suite # 605, City Tower 1, Sheikh Zayed Road, P.O. Box: 57734
